title: BitLegal
blurb: Smart-contract legal contracts platform: machine-readable, human-legible, and enforceable.
description: BitLegal unifies contract drafting, formal specification, and automated execution. Authors compose agreements using structured templates where each clause maps to testable predicates and deterministic actions. Outputs include: (1) a human-legible PDF/HTML; (2) a signed JSON policy manifest; (3) executable modules for Bitcoin flows (PSBT escrow, timelocks, oracles, dispute windows) and off-chain services. Every deployment emits an audit bundle: hashes of terms, code, and assets; signers; and a reproducible build stamp, enabling independent verification and long-term archiving.
